pages.text: The Rodeo Harness is a harness that can be placed in the armor slot of O-Horses. When equipped, it allows a horse, regardless of if it's tamed, to buck players off. $(br2)When a horse is wearing a Rodeo Harness, it'll be weary of other mounted horses and mules, allowing mounted players to guide it around the arena/ area.
The $(l)Rodeo Harness$() can be used on O-Horses to allow them to buck players off freely, regardless of tame status.
